definitions.definition: An agent of one intelligence agency or group who pretends to be interested in defecting or turning to another intelligence agency or group.
The action of dangling; a series of complex stick tricks and fakes in order to defeat the defender in style.
definitions.example: That was a sick dangle for a great goal!

definitions.definition: To hang loosely with the ability to swing.
definitions.example: His feet would dangle in the water.

definitions.definition: The action of performing a move or deke with the puck in order to get past a defender or goalie; perhaps because of the resemblance to dangling the puck on a string.
definitions.example: He dangled around three players and the goalie to score.

definitions.definition: To hang or trail something loosely.
definitions.example: I like to sit on the edge and dangle my feet in the water.

definitions.definition: Of a patient: to be positioned with the legs hanging over the edge of the bed.
To position (a patient) in this way.
